attributes.action: Stop MPs who are standing down because of corrupt expense fees from getting a 'pay off'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs who stand down should not be entitled to a tax free pay off. MPs who are standing down as a result of outrage regarding their behaviour should not continue to benefit from generous financial packages.  It is a national disgrace, Gordon Brown should end the pay offs if 'leadership means anything within the political system of this country! MPs who agree to step down should be made to do so with immediate effect the only reason they are not is they continue to milk the system it is hipocrisy. End it now Gordon Brown!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
